description.zh-cn: 中东路事件期间，由中国共产党发起，旨在支持苏联的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement initiated by the Chinese Communist Party during the Sino-Soviet conflict over the Chinese Eastern Railway in 1929 to support the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1929年中华民国与苏联因中东铁路问题爆发的军事冲突。
description.en: A military conflict in 1929 between the Republic of China and the Soviet Union over the Chinese Eastern Railway.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1919年至1943年期间活动的国际共产主义组织。
description.en: An international communist organization that was active from 1919 to 1943.

en: Far Eastern Bureau of the Comintern

description.zh-cn: 共产国际负责远东地区事务的下属机构。
description.en: A subordinate body of the Comintern responsible for affairs in the Far East.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党之一，在1929年时是中国的执政党。
description.en: One of the founding political parties of the Republic of China, and the ruling party of China in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党军事领导人，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military commander and Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党革命家和政治家，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A Chinese Communist revolutionary and politician, Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯远东地区的城市，哈巴罗夫斯克边疆区的首府。
description.en: A city in the Russian Far East, the administrative center of Khabarovsk Krai.

description.zh-cn: 1929年中东路事件期间，由共产国际在苏联伯力附近组建的军事单位，主要由中国矿工组成。
description.en: A military unit formed by the Comintern near Khabarovsk, Soviet Union, during the 1929 Sino-Soviet conflict, composed mainly of Chinese miners.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，奉系军阀领导人，中东路事件中指挥东北军与苏联作战。
description.en: A warlord of the Republic of China who controlled Northeast China and commanded the Northeastern Army against the Soviet Union during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 中东路事件期间，苏联进攻中国海拉尔地区的战役。
description.en: A battle during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929, involving the Soviet attack on the Chinese city of Hailar.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟，一个存在于1922年至1991年的欧亚大陆社会主义国家。
description.en: The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics, a socialist state in Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党革命家、军事家和外交家。
description.en: A Chinese Communist revolutionary, military officer, and diplomat.

description.zh-cn: 苏联的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际负责东方（亚洲）事务的下属机构。
description.en: A subordinate body of the Comintern responsible for affairs in the East (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 位于苏联伯力附近的一个地点，是远东工人游击队的组建地。
description.en: A location near Khabarovsk, Soviet Union, where the Far East Workers' Guerrilla was formed.

description.zh-cn: 苏联军事将领，苏联元帅，曾任苏联远东军区司令。
description.en: A Soviet military commander, Marshal of the Soviet Union, and commander of the Soviet Far Eastern Military District.

nodes.id: 黄平 (中共中央候补委员)

zh-cn: 黄平 (中共中央候补委员)

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期成员。
description.en: An early member of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，兵工专家。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party and an expert in ordnance.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，无线电专家。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party and a radio expert.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party.

en: Manchuria Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在满洲（中国东北）地区的省级领导机构。
description.en: The provincial leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Manchuria (Northeast China).

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党革命家和政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese Communist revolutionary and politician, former Chairman of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在1925年至1948年期间的中央政府。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，1929年与刘少奇一同被捕。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party, arrested along with Liu Shaoqi in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 1929年刘少奇和孟用潜在奉天因煽动罢工嫌疑被捕的事件。
description.en: The event in 1929 where Liu Shaoqi and Meng Yongqian were arrested in Fengtian on suspicion of inciting a strike.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early primary leaders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: “武装保卫苏联”运动是在中东路事件爆发后发起的。
description.en: The 'Armed Defense of the Soviet Union' movement was launched after the outbreak of the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际远东局明确要求中共中央提出“武装保卫苏联”的口号。
description.en: The Far Eastern Bureau of the Comintern explicitly demanded that the CCP Central Committee put forward the slogan 'Armed Defense of the Soviet Union'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党响应共产国际的号召，发起了“武装保卫苏联”运动。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party responded to the Comintern's call and initiated the 'Armed Defense of the Soviet Union' movement.

description.zh-cn: 作为“武装保卫苏联”运动的一部分，中国共产党组织了反对国民党的群众示威。
description.en: As part of the 'Armed Defense of the Soviet Union' movement, the Chinese Communist Party organized mass demonstrations against the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承响应“武装保卫苏联”的号召，加入并领导远东工人游击队。
description.en: Liu Bocheng responded to the call for the 'Armed Defense of the Soviet Union' by joining and leading the Far East Workers' Guerrilla.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英响应“武装保卫苏联”的号召，加入远东工人游击队。
description.en: Ye Jianying responded to the call for the 'Armed Defense of the Soviet Union' by joining the Far East Workers' Guerrilla.

description.zh-cn: 远东工人游击队与张学良领导的国民政府军作战。
description.en: The Far East Workers' Guerrilla fought against the National Government Army led by Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 远东工人游击队协助苏联进攻中国的海拉尔。
description.en: The Far East Workers' Guerrilla assisted the Soviet attack on Hailar, China.

description.zh-cn: 远东工人游击队由共产国际东方部于1929年在红河组建。
description.en: The Far East Workers' Guerrilla was formed in 1929 at Krasnaya Rechka by the Eastern Department of the Comintern.

description.zh-cn: 远东工人游击队归远东军区司令加伦将军指挥。
description.en: The Far East Workers' Guerrilla was under the command of General Vasily Blyukher, commander of the Far Eastern Military District.

relationships.source: 黄平 (中共中央候补委员)

position.zh-cn: 一中队政治指导员及全队的武器教官
position.en: Political instructor of the 1st squadron and weapons instructor for the team

description.zh-cn: 在远东工人游击队中从事党务工作。
description.en: Engaged in party affairs work in the Far East Workers' Guerrilla.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派遣伍修权担任苏联红军翻译以参与中东路事件。
description.en: The Comintern dispatched Wu Xiuquan to serve as a translator for the Soviet Red Army to participate in the Sino-Soviet conflict.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇于中东路事件期间担任中共满洲省委书记。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi served as the Secretary of the CCP Manchuria Provincial Committee during the Sino-Soviet conflict.

description.zh-cn: 中共满洲省委是中国共产党在东北地区的下级组织。
description.en: The CCP Manchuria Provincial Committee was a subordinate organization of the Chinese Communist Party in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共满洲省委书记的刘少奇发动了支持苏联的运动。
description.en: As Secretary of the CCP Manchuria Provincial Committee, Liu Shaoqi launched a movement in support of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇因在奉天煽动罢工嫌疑被捕，该事件中断了他在当地的活动。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi was arrested in Fengtian on suspicion of inciting a strike, which interrupted his activities in the area.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇与孟用潜于1929年8月22日一同在奉天被捕。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi and Meng Yongqian were arrested together in Fengtian on August 22, 1929.

description.zh-cn: 陈独秀致信中共中央，批评“武装保卫苏联”的口号，认为对中共不利。
description.en: Chen Duxiu wrote to the CCP Central Committee, criticizing the slogan 'Armed Defense of the Soviet Union' as detrimental to the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 因反对“武装保卫苏联”等主张，陈独秀被中国共产党开除党籍。
description.en: Chen Duxiu was expelled from the Chinese Communist Party for opposing policies such as the 'Armed Defense of the Soviet Union'.
